name: Arrow Escape
shortDescription: A complete, customizable grid-based arrow puzzle game template designed for quick reskinning, modification, and publishing on mobile platforms.
fullDescription:
Arrow Escape is a fully playable, ready-to-publish mobile puzzle game template developed by The Vayuputra. It features intuitive grid-based arrow mechanics, clean UI, and scalable difficulty, making it ideal for indie developers, beginners, and studios looking to launch a puzzle game quickly.

This package is a game template, not a framework. All core gameplay systems, UI, and tools are included and organized for easy understanding, customization, and extension.

Gameplay & Genre:

  • Casual / Hyper-casual puzzle game
  • Grid-based arrow path mechanics
  • Simple touch controls with increasing difficulty
  • Optimized for portrait mobile gameplay

Template Includes:

  • Complete playable puzzle game
  • Main gameplay scene
  • Built-in level editor (no coding required)
  • Level progression & difficulty scaling
  • Grid and arrow gameplay logic
  • Life / heart system
  • Expandable hint system
  • UI system (HUD, settings, feedback effects)
  • Sound & feedback manager
  • Clean and organized folder structure

Customization:

  • Easily change grid size and difficulty
  • Reskin UI and color themes
  • Add or modify hints
  • Extend gameplay rules
  • Create unlimited levels using the built-in editor
  • Most changes possible without deep code modifications
